sentences.en: Both the petitioner and respondent provide for the upkeep of the children.
sentences.cn: 离婚上诉方和被告方共同抚养子女。

sentences.en: Britain has decided that it can no longer afford the upkeep of Greenwich Mean Time.
sentences.cn: 英国已经决定不再负担维持格林威治标准时的费用.

sentences.en: He earned his own upkeep at a very early age.
He offered to pay £100 a month towards his son's upkeep.
sentences.cn: 他愿意每月付100英镑作为儿子的抚养费。

sentences.en: High Upkeep only taxes your gold by 50 % ( from 60 % ).
sentences.cn: 高维护费用保持50%的税率而不是以前的60%.

sentences.en: I can't afford the upkeep of a large house and garden.
sentences.cn: 我负担不起带花园的大房子的维护费.

sentences.en: Our taxes help pay for the upkeep of the city's parks.
sentences.cn: 我们交纳的税部分用于市内各公园的保养.

sentences.en: Poorer people find it hard to pay for their pet’s upkeep.
sentences.cn: 经济不宽裕的人难以负担养宠物的开销。

sentences.en: Tenants are responsible for the upkeep of rented property.
sentences.cn: 承租人应负责维修租用的房产。

sentences.en: The car casts five thousand dollars a year in upkeep.
sentences.cn: 这辆车子每年用掉五千元的保养费.

sentences.en: The defence secretary has responsibility for the upkeep of the armed forces.
sentences.cn: 国防部长对管理军队有责任.

sentences.en: The local council is responsible for the upkeep of roads.
sentences.cn: 地方理事会负责道路的保养.

sentences.en: The maintenance department is responsible for the general upkeep of the park.
sentences.cn: 维护部负责公园的一般养护。

sentences.en: The money will be used for the estate's upkeep.
sentences.cn: 这笔钱将用于物业维护。

sentences.en: The upkeep of a yacht is very expensive.
sentences.cn: 游艇的维修保养费是很昂贵的.

sentences.en: The upkeep of the large house is more than she can afford.
sentences.cn: 维修这幢大房子不是她能负担得起的.

trans.tran_cn: 保养，维修，维持，保养费，维修费
trans.tran_en: the process of keeping something in good condition
